prompt:
Nurse: Thank you for clarifying, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you experienced any nausea or vomiting along with the diarrhea?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Give me a moment to check how I can best support you. I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you been feeling weak, lethargic, or have you experienced any feelings of faintness or dizziness?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Have you had a fever, Mr. Valenzuela?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Have you started any new prescription medications recently, Mr. Valenzuela?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: Thank you for clarifying, Mr. Valenzuela. Just a few more questions for you. Has there been any recent changes to your diet that could possibly explain the diarrhea?
responses.our_model: Have you been in contact with other individuals with diarrhea or had any recent travel, Mr. Valenzuela?
